definition: to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

sentences.english: Indeed, many were unaware of the scandal at the French bank.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，很多人都不知道法国兴业银行的这个丑闻。

sentences.english: Of course, the 33-year-old Kerviel isn't employed at Société Générale.
sentences.chinese: 当然，今年33岁的凯维埃尔不再受雇于兴业银行。

sentences.english: The bank said it only discovered Mister Kerviel's activities on January twentieth.
sentences.chinese: 兴业银行说，在1月20日才发现科维尔先生的行为。

sentences.english: Societe Generale SA and Banco Santander SA led banking shares lower.
sentences.chinese: 法国兴业银行和西班牙桑坦德银行领跌银行股。

sentences.english: France's Société Générale is an honourable exception.
sentences.chinese: 在这方面法国的兴业银行是个值得尊敬的例外。

sentences.english: SocGen's case for buying sovereign bonds is controversial.
sentences.chinese: 法国兴业银行的主权债券的购买情况是有争议的。

sentences.english: Bouton said SocGen was strong enough to stay independent.
sentences.chinese: 布顿称，兴业银行足够强大，可保持独立性。

sentences.english: He began to plan a break-in at the Societe Generale Bank, in Nice.
sentences.chinese: 他开始策划对位于法国尼斯的兴业银行实施抢劫。

definition: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China
